articles.author: David Smith
articles.title: ‘People just want change’: political circus at Iowa state fair can’t dispel civic discontent - The Guardian US
articles.description: Presidential aspirants make the pilgrimage to Des Moines amid a sense of America as nation sunk in a political depression
articles.content: Donald Trump held aloft a pork chop on a stick. Ron DeSantis and children rode bumper cars and a ferris wheel, played carnival games and ate snow cones and ice-cream. Vivek Ramaswamy rapped Lose Your… [+10379 chars]
